Introduction

Momoka is a Japanese singer and dancer under MyDoll Entertainment. She was a former member of the K-Pop girl group Pink Fantasy and a former pre-debut member of HitGirlz. She was in multiple J-pop groups.

On May 10, 2024, Momoka was announced as a member of the upcoming co-ed group ToTh6y.
